turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, from what Starbucks do you want me to order it from.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Garden Grove Blvd. in the City of Garden Grove.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order me a black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The medium size I think it's called Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, they have different options on milk. Do you know what kind of milk you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are there options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have soy, 2%,whole, non-fat, coconut and almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, Do you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, but change the milk to non-fat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, non-fat mild with whipped cream. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'll go pick it up. I just want you to order it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, the order has been placed. It should be ready by the time you get there. They're going to send you the receipt via text message on your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome!
